thread.title: A Slice of the High Life: Homes in Luxury Towers

author: Sandra Ward
title: A Slice of the High Life: Homes in Luxury Towers
text:
$4.65 million Chicago
Three bedrooms, three bathrooms, one half-bath
This 3,700-square-foot, 24th-floor penthouse has a staircase to a solarium and roof deck. A 60-foot wall of windows offers southerly and westerly views. The kitchen, with a terrace, features oak cabinetry by Poggenpohl, three sinks, two refrigerators, a wine cooler and a... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
